mapper.delete: DELETE FROM image WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND INSTR(image_src, #{itemId}) > 0
mapper.select: SELECT item_id AS "item.id", it.name AS "item.name", g.tags, g.price, g.sales_quantity AS salesQuantity, g.remain_quantity AS remainQuantity, g.shipping_fee AS shippingFee, i.image_src AS "item.thumbnailUrl" FROM item it JOIN market m USING (market_id) JOIN goods g USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE market_id IS NOT NULL AND m.open_status ='1' AND it.open_status = 1 AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id || '-1') > 0 ORDER BY dbms_random.value

SELECT item_id AS "item.id", it.name AS "item.name", it.open_status AS "item.openStatus", g.price, g.sales_quantity AS salesQuantity, g.remain_quantity AS remainQuantity, g.shipping_fee AS shippingFee, i.image_src AS "item.thumbnailUrl" FROM item it JOIN market m USING (market_id) JOIN goods g USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id || '-1') > 0

SELECT item_id AS item.id, it.name AS item.name, g.price, g.remain_quantity AS remainQuantity, it.image_src AS item.thumbnailUrl FROM item it JOIN goods g USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE it.market_id = #{marketId} AND INSTR(i.image_src, it.item_id + '_1') > 0

SELECT item_id AS "item.id", name AS "item.name", price, remain_quantity AS remainQuantity, image_src AS "item.thumbnailUrl" FROM (SELECT item_id, item.name, price, remain_quantity, image_src FROM item JOIN market USING (market_id) JOIN goods USING (item_id) JOIN image USING (member_id) WHERE item.open_status = 1 AND market_id IS NOT NULL AND (INSTR(image_src, item_id || '-1') > 0) ORDER BY upload_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT item_id AS "item.id", it.name AS "item.name", g.price, g.sales_quantity AS salesQuantity, g.remain_quantity AS remainQuantity, g.shipping_fee AS shippingFee, i.image_src AS "item.thumbnailUrl" FROM item it JOIN market m USING (market_id) JOIN goods g USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE market_id IS NOT NULL AND m.open_status ='1' AND it.open_status = 1 AND (INSTR(it.name, #{keyword}) > 0 OR INSTR(g.tags, #{keyword}) > 0) AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id || '-1') > 0

SELECT item_id, it.name AS item_name, it.upload_date, it.description, it.open_status, market_id, m.name AS market_name, g.tags, g.price, g.goods_size, g.sales_quantity, g.remain_quantity, g.shipping_fee, member_id, i.image_src FROM item it FULL OUTER JOIN goods g USING (item_id) FULL OUTER JOIN market m USING (market_id) FULL OUTER JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE item_id = #{item_id} AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id) > 0
mapper.insert: SELECT ('G' || item_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM DUAL INSERT ALL INTO item (item_id, name, upload_date, description, open_status, market_id) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{item.name}, SYSDATE, #{item.description}, #{item.openStatus}, (SELECT market_id FROM market JOIN member USING (member_id) WHERE member_id = #{item.market.member.id})) INTO goods (item_id, tags, price, shipping_fee, goods_size, sales_quantity, remain_quantity) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{tags}, #{price}, #{shippingFee}, #{size}, #{salesQuantity}, #{salesQuantity}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET sales_quantity = #{salesQuantity}, remain_quantity = (CASE WHEN sales_quantity > #{salesQuantity} THEN (remain_quantity + (#{salesQuantity} - sales_quantity)) ELSE (remain_quantity - (sales_quantity - #{salesQuantity})) END) WHERE item_id = #{item.id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM item it JOIN order_goods og ON it.item_id = og.goods_id WHERE it.item_id = #{item_id}

SELECT item_id AS "item.id", it.name AS "item.name", s.is_borrowed, i.image_src AS "item.thumbnailUrl" FROM item it JOIN market m USING (market_id) JOIN share_thing s USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE it.open_status = 1 AND market_id IS NOT NULL AND m.open_status = '1' AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id || '-1') > 0

SELECT item_id AS "item.id", it.name AS "item.name", it.open_status AS "item.openStatus", s.is_borrowed AS isBorrowed, i.image_src AS "item.thumbnailUrl" FROM item it JOIN market m USING (market_id) JOIN share_thing s USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id || '-1') > 0

SELECT it.item_id AS item.id, it.name AS item.name, s.is_borrowed, i.image_src AS item.thumbnailUrl, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM borrow_reservation WHERE it.item_id) AS reservation_number FROM item it JOIN share_thing s USING (item_id) JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE it.market_id = #{marketId} AND INSTR(i.image_src, it.item_id + '_1') > 0

SELECT item_id, it.name, it.upload_date, it.description, it.open_status, market_id, s.precaution, s.is_borrowed, member_id, i.image_src FROM item it FULL OUTER JOIN share_thing s USING (item_id) FULL OUTER JOIN market m USING (market_id) FULL OUTER JOIN image i USING (member_id) WHERE item_id = #{item_id} AND INSTR(i.image_src, item_id) > 0
mapper.insert: SELECT ('S' || item_seq.NEXTVAL) FROM DUAL INSERT ALL INTO item (item_id, name, upload_date, description, open_status, market_id) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{item.name}, SYSDATE, #{item.description}, #{item.openStatus}, (SELECT market_id FROM market JOIN member USING (member_id) WHERE member_id = #{item.market.member.id})) INTO share_thing (item_id, precaution) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{precaution}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(borrow_id) FROM item it JOIN borrow b ON it.item_id = b.share_thing_id WHERE it.item_id = #{item_id}
